customer_reviews.title: Selfie by BLU 3/5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The Selfie by BLU (Bold Like Us) runs the Android Kit Kat system, offers 4G, and is a very reasonable $249. The Selfie has a 4.7 HD screen and a 13 MP camera to take "selfies". The phone comes with earbuds, wall charger and a protective silicone case plus instruction manual. I'm an IPhone lady but this phone would be great for those who prefer Android and don't wan to pay $500-$600 for a phone. This phone is compatible on several networks.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle
